mapper.sql: d.id, d.focumentImg, d.resumeID, d.effective, d.documentName, d.createTime, d.updateTime, d.version, d.isDeleted, d.createBy, d.updateBy

where 1=1 and d.id = #{condition.id} and d.focumentImg = #{condition.focumentImg} and d.resumeID = #{condition.resumeID} and d.effective = #{condition.effective} and d.documentName = #{condition.documentName} and d.createTime = #{condition.createTime} and d.updateTime = #{condition.updateTime} and d.version = #{condition.version} and d.isDeleted = #{condition.isDeleted} and d.createBy = #{condition.createBy} and d.updateBy = #{condition.updateBy}

where 1=1 and d.id = #{condition.id} and UPPER(d.focumentImg) LIKE UPPER(CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{condition.focumentImg}),'%')) and UPPER(d.resumeID) LIKE UPPER(CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{condition.resumeID}),'%')) and UPPER(d.effective) LIKE UPPER(CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{condition.effective}),'%')) and UPPER(d.documentName) LIKE UPPER(CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{condition.documentName}),'%')) and UPPER(d.createTime) LIKE UPPER(CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{condition.createTime}),'%')) and UPPER(d.updateTime) LIKE UPPER(CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{condition.updateTime}),'%')) and UPPER(d.version) LIKE UPPER(CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{condition.version}),'%')) and UPPER(d.isDeleted) LIKE UPPER(CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{condition.isDeleted}),'%')) and UPPER(d.createBy) LIKE UPPER(CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{condition.createBy}),'%')) and UPPER(d.updateBy) LIKE UPPER(CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{condition.updateBy}),'%'))
mapper.update: update document set focumentImg=#{focumentImg}, resumeID=#{resumeID}, effective=#{effective}, documentName=#{documentName}, createTime=#{createTime}, updateTime=#{updateTime}, version=#{version}, isDeleted=#{isDeleted}, createBy=#{createBy}, updateBy=#{updateBy}, where id=#{id} and version = #{version}-1
mapper.select: select from document d left join attachment attachment on d.focumentImg = attachment.id ${orderByClause}
mapper.sql: d.id as 'id', d.version as 'version',d.focumentImg as 'focumentImg',d.resumeID as 'resumeID',d.effective as 'effective',d.documentName as 'documentName', attachment.id as 'attachment.id', attachment.version as 'attachment.version',attachment.datestr as 'attachment.datestr',attachment.path as 'attachment.path',attachment.name as 'attachment.name',attachment.title as 'attachment.title',attachment.type as 'attachment.type'
mapper.select: select from document d left join attachment attachment on d.focumentImg = attachment.id where d.id = #{id} and d.isDeleted = false
